info.title: API Base Controller
info.description: Controlador base para la API. No expone endpoints directamente.

get.description: Returns a list of audit logs
Returns a single audit log entry
Get paginated list of banks. Permite filtrar por nombre (name), código (code), estado (status) y cantidad por página (per_page).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filtrar por nombre del banco (texto parcial)

get.description: Returns bank data

delete.description: Deletes a record and returns no content

get.description: Get paginated list of categories. Permite filtrar por nombre (name), estado (status) y cantidad por página (per_page).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filtrar por nombre de la categoría (texto parcial)

get.description: Returns category data

delete.description: Deletes a record and returns no content

get.description: Get paginated list of cities. Permite filtrar por nombre (name), código (code), estado (status) y cantidad por página (per_page).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filtrar por nombre de la ciudad (texto parcial)

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Filtrar por código de la ciudad

get.description: Returns city data

delete.description: Deletes a record and returns no content

post.summary: Create commerce with legal representatives and documents

get.description: Returns paginated list of commerces. Permite filtrar por término de búsqueda (search), estado (status), cantidad por página (per_page) y número de página (page).
Returns a single commerce.
Returns list of countries. Permite filtrar por nombre (name), código (code), estado (status: 1=activos, 0=inactivos, all=todos) y número de registros por página (per_page).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filtrar por nombre del país (texto parcial)

get.description: Returns country data

delete.description: Deletes a record and returns no content

get.description: Get paginated list of departments. Permite filtrar por name, code y status.
Returns department data

delete.description: Deletes a record and returns no content

get.description: Returns paginated list of establishment types.
Returns a single establishment type.

post.description: Revokes the current user's token and logs out.

get.description: Returns id, name, email, roles and permissions of the authenticated user.

get.summary: Get current authenticated user permissions and roles
get.description: Returns permissions and roles of the authenticated user.
Get paginated list of neighborhoods. Permite filtrar por nombre (name), código (code), estado (status) y cantidad por página (per_page).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filtrar por nombre del barrio (texto parcial)

get.description: Get a specific neighborhood
Returns a list of all permissions created in the system.
Get paginated list of PQRS Types. Permite filtrar por status, name y code.
Returns a single Pqrs Type
Get paginated list of priority types. Permite filtrar por name, code y status.
Returns priority type data

delete.description: Deletes a record and returns no content

get.description: Get paginated list of roles. Permite filtrar por name, description, permission y status.

post.description: Creates a new role and assigns permissions.

post.summary: Assign roles and permissions to user
post.description: Assigns roles and permissions to a user.

get.description: Returns the detail of a role including its permissions and user count.
Get paginated list of support statuses. Permite filtrar por nombre (name), código (code), color, estado (status) y cantidad por página (per_page).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filtrar por nombre del estado de soporte (texto parcial)

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Filtrar por código del estado de soporte

get.description: Returns the detail of a support status.

delete.description: Deletes the specified support status (soft delete).

get.description: Get paginated list of users. Permite filtrar por nombre (name), email, estado (status) y cantidad por página (per_page).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filtrar por nombre de usuario (texto parcial)

get.description: Returns a single user with roles and permissions.

patch.description: Updates the status (active/inactive) of a user.

get.description: Returns a list of users with the administrator role.

name.description: Get the validation rules that apply to the request.

status.title: status
status.description: Status of the city (A: Active, I: Inactive)

code.title: code
code.description: Unique code for the city (6 alphanumeric characters)

DeleteBankRequest.description: Request schema for deleting a bank. No body parameters required.

DeleteCategoryRequest.description: Request schema for deleting a category. No body parameters required.

DeleteCityRequest.description: Request schema for deleting a city. No body parameters required.

DeleteDepartmentRequest.description: Request schema for deleting a department. No body parameters required.

DeletePqrsTypeRequest.description: Request schema for deleting a PQRS type. No body parameters required.

DeletePriorityTypeRequest.description: Request schema for deleting a priority type. No body parameters required.

status.title: status

name.description: Nombre del tipo PQRS para filtrar.

code.description: Código del tipo PQRS para filtrar.

MeRequest.description: Request schema for authenticated user info. No body parameters required.

code.description: Unique code for the neighborhood (6 alphanumeric characters)

status.description: Status of the neighborhood (A: Active, I: Inactive)

permissions.description: Array of permission names to assign

sync.description: If true, replaces all permissions; if false, adds

ShowBankRequest.description: Request schema for showing a bank. No body parameters required.

ShowCategoryRequest.description: Request schema for showing a category. No body parameters required.

ShowCityRequest.description: Request schema for showing a city. No body parameters required.

ShowDepartmentRequest.description: Request schema for showing a department. No body parameters required.

ShowPqrsTypeRequest.description: Request schema for showing a PQRS type. No body parameters required.

ShowPriorityTypeRequest.description: Request schema for showing a priority type. No body parameters required.

roles.description: Array of role names to assign

permissions.description: Array of permission names to assign

sync.description: If true, replaces all roles/permissions; if false, adds

user_id.description: ID del usuario autenticado o null

payload.description: Cuerpo de la petición (campos sensibles ofuscados)
